column5: Great show tonight Dave!  Great info on crank baits.  Thanks.   I really gotta get up that way.  Cheers.
I gotta PVR it late tonight.. I always watch it thursday at lunch!!

I won't ruin it for you then with a more detailed analysis.  Enjoy it.   I found it quite informative and entertaining.  "Gussy" the guide was a great guest!  Watched it with my 4 y/o and he too loved it!

I quite enjoyed it also.  That's my favorite kind of fishing program, north country walleye/pike fishing althought the pike were obviously not the intended species.  Informative and entertaining.    Great show.
I also watched it tonight great show
Ok another stupid question...What channel is the show on, and when is it on...? Please help a guy out here need a fix..LOL
I usually pvr it on weekend ,tsn i think ,
tb4me   the schedule is on Dave's home page.  http://www.factsoffishing.com/

Thanks guys glad you liked that show! Your support as always is awesome. As far as when we are on here is a full list of air times The Score Sat@ 9AM Sun@ 9AM & 130PM WFN Wed@7PM, Thur@3AM & 11AM Sat@530PM, Sun@930AM  I hope to see you all at the Spring Fishing and Boat Show I will be there on the Sat & Sun.
